mapper.sql: SELECT id, process_instance_id, process_definition_id, process_definition_key, process_definition_name, task_definition_key, task_name, task_description, task_type, task_status, assignee, assignee_name, candidate_users, candidate_groups, owner, owner_name, parent_task_id, priority, due_date, follow_up_date, form_key, task_variables, execution_id, activity_instance_id, tenant_id, business_key, create_time, start_time, claim_time, end_time, duration, delete_reason, suspension_time, created_by, updated_by, updated_time FROM wf_task
mapper.select: WHERE process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId} AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY create_time DESC
WHERE process_definition_id = #{processDefinitionId} AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY create_time DESC
WHERE process_definition_key = #{processDefinitionKey} AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY create_time DESC
WHERE task_status = #{taskStatus} AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY create_time DESC
WHERE assignee = #{assignee} AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY create_time DESC
WHERE (FIND_IN_SET(#{candidateUser}, candidate_users) > 0 OR assignee IS NULL) AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY create_time DESC
WHERE FIND_IN_SET(#{candidateGroup}, candidate_groups) > 0 AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY create_time DESC
WHERE owner = #{owner} AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY create_time DESC
WHERE task_type = #{taskType} AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY create_time DESC
WHERE priority = #{priority} AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY create_time DESC
WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY create_time DESC
WHERE business_key = #{businessKey} AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY create_time DESC
WHERE assignee = #{assignee} AND task_status IN ('PENDING', 'ACTIVE', 'SUSPENDED') AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY priority DESC, create_time ASC
WHERE assignee = #{assignee} AND task_status IN ('COMPLETED', 'TERMINATED') AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY end_time DESC

WHERE (FIND_IN_SET(#{userId}, candidate_users) > 0 OR FIND_IN_SET(#{groupId}, candidate_groups) > 0) AND assignee IS NULL AND task_status = 'PENDING' AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY priority DESC, create_time ASC
WHERE due_date < NOW() AND task_status NOT IN ('COMPLETED', 'TERMINATED') AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY due_date ASC
WHERE due_date BETWEEN NOW() AND DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY) AND task_status NOT IN ('COMPLETED', 'TERMINATED') AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY due_date ASC
WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY create_time DESC
WHERE task_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{taskName}, '%') AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN task_status = 'PENDING' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as pending, SUM(CASE WHEN task_status = 'ACTIVE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as active, SUM(CASE WHEN task_status = 'COMPLETED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as completed, SUM(CASE WHEN task_status = 'TERMINATED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as terminated, SUM(CASE WHEN due_date < NOW() AND task_status NOT IN ('COMPLETED', 'TERMINATED') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as overdue FROM wf_task WHERE del_flag = '0'
AND assignee = #{assignee}

SELECT task_status as status, CASE WHEN task_status = 'PENDING' THEN '待处理' WHEN task_status = 'ACTIVE' THEN '进行中' WHEN task_status = 'COMPLETED' THEN '已完成' WHEN task_status = 'TERMINATED' THEN '已终止' WHEN task_status = 'SUSPENDED' THEN '已暂停' ELSE task_status END as statusName, COUNT(*) as count FROM wf_task WHERE del_flag = '0' GROUP BY task_status ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT assignee, COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN task_status = 'COMPLETED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as completed, SUM(CASE WHEN due_date < NOW() AND task_status NOT IN ('COMPLETED', 'TERMINATED') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as overdue, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN task_status = 'COMPLETED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 2) as completionRate FROM wf_task WHERE assignee IS NOT NULL AND del_flag = '0' GROUP BY assignee ORDER BY total DESC

SELECT task_type as type, CASE WHEN task_type = 'USER_TASK' THEN '用户任务' WHEN task_type = 'SERVICE_TASK' THEN '服务任务' WHEN task_type = 'SCRIPT_TASK' THEN '脚本任务' WHEN task_type = 'MANUAL_TASK' THEN '手工任务' ELSE task_type END as typeName, COUNT(*) as count FROM wf_task WHERE del_flag = '0' GROUP BY task_type ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT process_definition_id as processDefinitionId, process_definition_key as processDefinitionKey, process_definition_name as processDefinitionName, COUNT(*) as count FROM wf_task WHERE del_flag = '0' GROUP BY process_definition_id, process_definition_key, process_definition_name ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, start_time, end_time)) as avgDuration FROM wf_task WHERE start_time IS NOT NULL AND end_time IS NOT NULL AND del_flag = '0'

SELECT task_type as type, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, start_time, end_time)) as avgDuration, COUNT(*) as count FROM wf_task WHERE start_time IS NOT NULL AND end_time IS NOT NULL AND del_flag = '0' GROUP BY task_type ORDER BY avgDuration DESC

SELECT assignee, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, start_time, end_time)) as avgDuration, COUNT(*) as count FROM wf_task WHERE assignee IS NOT NULL AND start_time IS NOT NULL AND end_time IS NOT NULL AND del_flag = '0' GROUP BY assignee ORDER BY avgDuration ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN priority = 'HIGH' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as highPriority, SUM(CASE WHEN priority = 'MEDIUM' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as mediumPriority, SUM(CASE WHEN priority = 'LOW' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as lowPriority, SUM(CASE WHEN due_date < NOW() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as overdue, SUM(CASE WHEN due_date BETWEEN NOW() AND DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as soonOverdue FROM wf_task WHERE task_status = 'PENDING' AND del_flag = '0'
AND assignee = #{assignee}

SELECT t.*, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, t.start_time, COALESCE(t.end_time, NOW())) as currentDuration, CASE WHEN t.due_date < NOW() AND t.task_status NOT IN ('COMPLETED', 'TERMINATED') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as isOverdue FROM wf_task t WHERE t.id = #{taskId} AND t.del_flag = '0'
WHERE priority BETWEEN #{minPriority} AND #{maxPriority} AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY priority DESC, create_time ASC
WHERE owner = #{userId} AND assignee != #{userId} AND assignee IS NOT NULL AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY create_time DESC
WHERE process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId} AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY create_time ASC, task_definition_key ASC
